note_text: Predominantly automotive fuel also includes sale of fuel by supermarkets
Part of the Predominately non-food stores category
The Food, drink and tobacco category, Household goods category and Other non-food category include revisions to the commodity classifications provided by respondents.
Small retailers are those with less than 100 employment
Large retailers are those with greater than 99 employment
National Health Service receipts are excluded
Year to date (January to current month)
